ModMetaData.name: Traits Excel (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: PsyKick
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of PsyKicks mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1389054729
- Rewrote it to use patches instead to avoid overwriting vanilla code - Added support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2451324814][SYR] Trait Value[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TraitsExcel][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] V1.1 This mod adds new traits to either enhance or debuff your gameplay.
This mod includes these following traits:
Gorgeous - Upgraded beautiful
Hideous - Upgraded staggeringly ugly
Workaholic - Upgraded industrious
Lethargic - Upgraded slothful
Sprinter - Upgraded jogger
Extra Careful Shooter - Upgraded careful shooter
Bad Shooter - Upgraded Trigger Happy
This is my first mod that I have published on Steam but am working on a huge mod as of currently, I will add more traits from time to time.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
